column5: My place is close to restaurants, museums, botanical gardens, Will Rodgers Coliseum, fine dining, family-friendly activities, shopping and nightlife. You will also be only 15 miles from the Dallas Cowboy (AT&T Stadium) and the Texas Rangers Stadium. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Very Nice 1 BD close to Museums/Will Rogers/TCU
